52. The undertaking may disclose by head count or full time equivalent (FTE) the following
information:
(a) full-time employees, and breakdowns by gender and by region; and (b) part-time
employees, and breakdowns by gender and by region.
Disclosure Requirement S1-7 – Characteristics of non-employees in the undertaking’s
own workforce
53. The undertaking shall describe key characteristics of non-employees in its own
workforce.
